titles.title: Kingpin Designation Improvement Act of 2016
A bill to amend the Foreign Narcotics Kingpin Designation Act to protect classified information in Federal court challenges.
Kingpin Designation Improvement Act of 2016

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Kingpin Designation Improvement Act of 2016
This bill amends the Foreign Narcotics Kingpin Designation Act to allow classified information to be submitted to a reviewing court ex parte or in camera in a judicial review of a determination by the President that a foreign person is subject to sanctions as a significant foreign narcotics trafficker.
